verses.text: \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5329"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul takes refuge. \w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* wings \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* take shelter until \w the|strong="H6440"\w* danger \w has|strong="H7586"\w* passed.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* cry \w out|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* God Most High,\f + \fr 57:2 \ft Hebrew Elohim-Elyon\f* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* God \w who|strong="H5315"\w* fulfills \w His|strong="H3588"\w* purpose \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* reaches \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H7121"\w* saves \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w He|strong="H5921"\w* rebukes \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H7121"\w* trample \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. Selah God sends \w forth|strong="H7121"\w* \w His|strong="H7121"\w* loving devotion \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w His|strong="H7121"\w* truth.

\w My|strong="H7971"\w* soul \w is|strong="H2617"\w* among \w the|strong="H7971"\w* lions; \w I|strong="H7971"\w* lie \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H8064"\w* ravenous beastsâ€” \w with|strong="H8064"\w* men whose teeth \w are|strong="H8064"\w* spears \w and|strong="H7971"\w* arrows, whose tongues \w are|strong="H8064"\w* sharp swords.

\w Be|strong="H1121"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, above \w the|strong="H8432"\w* heavens; \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w Your|strong="H8432"\w* glory cover \w all|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* spread \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* feet; \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H3519"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* despondent. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* dug \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* fallen \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*! Selah

\w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* sing \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* music.

Awake, \w my|strong="H3559"\w* glory!\f + \fr 57:8 \ft Or Awake, my soul!\f* Awake, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* harp \w and|strong="H3820"\w* lyre! \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* awaken \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* \w will|strong="H3519"\w* praise You, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations; \w I|strong="H5782"\w* \w will|strong="H3519"\w* sing \w Your|strong="H5782"\w* praises among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w Your|strong="H3034"\w* loving devotion reaches \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Your|strong="H3034"\w* faithfulness \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, above \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; may \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* glory cover \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
